definitions.definition: Composed of inherently different or distinct elements; incongruous .
examples: The board of the company was decidedly disparate , with no two members from the same social or economic background.

definitions.definition: Essentially different ; of different species, unlike but not opposed in pairs.
Utterly unlike ; incapable of being compared; having no common ground .

main_definition: Composed of inherently different or distinct elements; incongruous .
secondary_definitions: Essentially different ; of different species, unlike but not opposed in pairs.
Utterly unlike ; incapable of being compared; having no common ground .
